🚀 Features
⭐️ Select or Deselect a friend
⭐️ Select all friends
⭐️ One click and all selected friends start deleting
⭐️ Clean and intuitive design
⭐️ Account switching support

If you ask: 
How to delete all friends on Facebook? 
How to remove inactive friends on Facebook?
How to mass unfriend people on Facebook?
🚀 Then you should choose Mass Unfriender

❗️Updates
  v1: Facebook new design supported

❗️❗️❗️ The Chrome extension is in no way associated with Facebook and its partners.
